androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Constra.Popup:
: title: "Settings" size_hint: None, None size: 400, 400
BoxLayout: orientation: "vertical" padding: 15 spacing: 10
Label: id: intensity_label text: "Intensity: 50" font_size: 16 color: 0, 0, 0, 1
Slider: id: intensity_slider min: 0 max: 100 value: 50 on_value: intensity_label.text = f"Intensity: {int(self.value)}"
Label: id: frequency_label text: "Frequency: 2" font_size: 16 color: 0, 0, 0, 1
Slider: id: frequency_slider min: 0 max: 5 value: 2 on_value: frequency_label.text = f"Frequency: {int(self.value)}"
Button: text: "Close" background_color: 0.2, 0.6, 0.2, 1 color: 1, 1, 1, 1 on_press: root.dismiss()
: title: "Help" size_hint: None, None size: 400, 300
BoxLayout: orientation: "vertical" padding: 15
Label: text: "Help information" font_size: 16 color: 0, 0, 0, 1
Button: text: "Close" background_color: 0.2, 0.6, 0.2, 1 color: 1, 1, 1, 1 on_press: root.dismiss()
